title: Things I'll Never Say Out Loud

messages.text: I replay our conversations in my head before I fall asleep. Every single one.
Sometimes I write your name just to see how it looks next to mine. It always looks perfect.
Your voice is my favorite sound in the entire universe. I'm not even exaggerating.
I've imagined our future more times than I'd ever admit â€” and it's always beautiful.
If you're reading this, you found my secret. Which means you're as curious about me as I am about you. And that makes me really, really happy.
